ai.summary: Fairy Glen Trail - long is a gentle 5.2 km hike in the UK that winds through grassy landscapes and rolling terrain. Rated easy, it’s well-suited for families and casual walkers seeking scenic rural views and a relaxed pace.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly grassy paths with occasional uneven patches, small rises, and some muddy stretches after rain. Expect smooth sections and a few rocky or uneven steps near stream crossings. Overall flat to gently undulating with wide, easy-to-follow trails.
ai.safety_notes: Weather in the UK can change quickly. Wear sturdy waterproof footwear and bring a waterproof layer. Stay on marked paths, supervise children, and watch for slippery grass when wet. Carry water, a snack, and a charged phone; inform someone of your plans if hiking alone. In fog or heavy rain, visibility may be reduced; consider postponing.
recommended_gear: Map, compass, or a fully charged phone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Late spring to early autumn (roughly March to October) offer the best conditions, with drier trails and clearer views. Winter visits can be rewarding but involve higher risk of ice, mud, and rapid weather changes.

seo.title: Fairy Glen Trail - long (5.2 km) – Easy UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore Fairy Glen Trail - long, an easy 5.2 km hike in the UK. Enjoy rolling grassy landscapes, gentle terrain, and scenic views perfect for a family-friendly day out.
